gobblin.metrics

Class GobblinMetricsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.GobblinMetricsRegistry

  • public class GobblinMetricsRegistry
extends Object
    Registry that stores instances of GobblinMetrics identified by an arbitrary string id. The static method getInstance() provides a static instance of this this class that should be considered the global registry of metrics.

    An application could also instantiate one or more registries to, for example, separate instances of GobblinMetrics into different scopes.

    • Method Detail

      • putIfAbsent

        public GobblinMetrics putIfAbsent(String id,
                                  GobblinMetrics gobblinMetrics)
        Associate a GobblinMetrics instance with a given ID if the ID is not already associated with a GobblinMetrics instance.
        Parameters:
        id - the given GobblinMetrics ID
        gobblinMetrics - the GobblinMetrics instance to be associated with the given ID
        Returns:
        the previous GobblinMetrics instance associated with the ID or null if there's no previous GobblinMetrics instance associated with the ID

      • get

        public Optional<GobblinMetrics> get(String id)
        Get the GobblinMetrics instance associated with a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the given GobblinMetrics ID
        Returns:
        the GobblinMetrics instance associated with the ID, wrapped in an Optional or Optional.absent() if no GobblinMetrics instance for the given ID is found

      • getOrDefault

        public GobblinMetrics getOrDefault(String id,
                                   Callable<? extends GobblinMetrics> valueLoader)
        Get the GobblinMetrics instance associated with a given ID. If the ID is not found this method returns the GobblinMetrics returned by the given Callable, and creates a mapping between the specified ID and the GobblinMetrics instance returned by the Callable.
        Parameters:
        id - the given GobblinMetrics ID
        valueLoader - a Callable that returns a GobblinMetrics, the Callable is only invoked if the given id is not found
        Returns:
        a GobblinMetrics instance associated with the id

      • remove

        public GobblinMetrics remove(String id)
        Remove the GobblinMetrics instance with a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the given GobblinMetrics ID
        Returns:
        removed GobblinMetrics instance or null if no GobblinMetrics instance for the given ID is found

      • getInstance

        public static GobblinMetricsRegistry getInstance()
        Get an instance of GobblinMetricsRegistry.
        Returns:
        an instance of GobblinMetricsRegistry

      • getMetricContext

        public MetricContext getMetricContext(State state,
                                      Class<?> klazz,
                                      List<Tag<?>> tags)

        Creates MetricContext. Tries to read the name of the parent context from key "metrics.context.name" at state, and tries to get the parent context by name from the MetricContext registry (the parent context must be registered).

        Automatically adds two tags to the inner context:

        • component: attempts to determine which component type within gobblin-api generated this instance.
        • class: the specific class of the object that generated this instance of Instrumented
